title: Help With Constant Crashing During Game Loading
body:
The problem starts at 1:15.

I just keep getting a series of crashes that prevent me from loading into the game until everyone else on both teams have already loaded in. Can be quite frustrating at sometimes.

It will bring up error dialogs like:

- "You have disconnected. Please check your internet settings and try again."
- Bugsplat
- Just close out to the "RECONNECT" base client

EDIT: I've uninstalled and reinstalled two times already

replies.body: Thanks for the video!  Bugsplats can happy for a variety of reasons, mostly driver or hardware related.  Since a reinstall didn't work, your drivers could be out of date.  Your best bet would be to go over the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot towards a fix.  Let me know if you have any questions!
